item.title: Open Source Foundries at Embedded World 2018
item.description: Open Source Foundries is excited to have an opportunity to demonstrate our end to end IoT microPlatforms at this years Embedded World conference in Nuremburg, Germany. The Embedded World conference takes place between February 27th-March 1st at the Embedded World conference Center. OSF will be presenting in the Zephyr booth, located in Hall 4, booth number: 4-680.

item.title: Open Source Foundries at ELC / Open IoT Summit 2018
item.description:
Open Source Foundries is excited to have an opportunity to demonstrate our end to end IoT microPlatforms at this years Embedded Linux Conference and the Open IoT Summit alongside the Zephry project.

This year, the events will take place in Portland Oregon, at the downtown Portland Hilton from March 12-15. Open Source Foundries will be presenting on 4 topics at this year’s IoT Summit.
